name: Gassy Gambit
description:
Hey there and welcome to Gassy Gambit! This game was created for GameDevHQ's 2022 Game Jam using the theme "Running Out Of Time."

Gassy Gambit is a simple single stage game about trying to get to the bathroom before the timer runs out. It is an unfortunate race against biology and yet, a celebration of the little victories.

We strived to adhere to the original one week deadline. While there are some annoying bugs, we got it just under that deadline. We won't be making any further updates to this build as we'll be returning our efforts to our upcoming title, Lymph City Blues. 

Feel free to visit our website at www.quillitystudios.com and check out Lymph City Blues on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2014240/Lymph_City_Blues/
